entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
